pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Spot Clear Salicylic Acid Patch 48 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Transparent patch with salicylic acid and tea tree
clears spots, blemishes and pimples overnight.

Warnings

To ensure skin compatibility, it is advisable to test a small area of the skin before use. Use the mask immediately after opening to prevent essence from drying out. CAUTION: For external use only.

Ingredients

Acrylates Copolymer, Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree)Leaf Oil, PVP, Salicylic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Polysorbate 80, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) SeedExtract, Volcanic Ash, Sodium Metabisulfite, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Hyaluronate *(Water/Aqua, Alcohol Denat.)

Directions

 Directions
1. Cleanse skin.
2. Tear open sachet and peel off a transparent patch from backing.
3. Place patch on pimple.
4. Wear for a few hours or overnight.
